name: MasteringWindowsShortcuts
0:
”Alexa, open Mastering Windows”
”Alexa, start Mastering Windows”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mastering windows
des:
Alexa can help you learn Windows keyboard shortcuts or study for your test. You can review the flash cards and then test your knowledge. At any point you can say "Alexa, review mode" to switch to review or say "Alexa, test mode" to start a test. You can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next card. At any point during the test, you can say "Alexa, what's my score" to get your current test score.
 Your information, scores and history from this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
